name: Snowfriends
description:
Snowfriends is a chill sandbox (snowbox?) game where you build snowfriends.

There are no:

  • objectives
  • goals
  • failure states
  • win conditions

Just play in the snow, build some friends, and put things on them.

Originally made as a tiny tech demo prototype for gm(48) #23. Now updated as a slightly less tiny prototype. But like, there's still not really anything to do in the game. Other than building snowfriends, of course.

Developed by @Bakufreak
